content: It is very difficult for us to know we love somebody because it is an insecure position to be in. But in the end, it is important to be honest about your love because life is not that long.

author: Yoko Ono
authorOccupation: Artist, peace activist, singer, songwriter, feminist
content: Marriage is a difficult project. When seven years have passed and all your body's cells have been replaced, you're meant to experience that seven-year itch.

author: Yoko Ono
authorOccupation: Artist, peace activist, singer, songwriter, feminist
content: DJs are in incredible competition, musically. And they are the most musically creative and sensitive people in all the music charts. I am amazed how they are.

author: Yoko Ono
authorOccupation: Artist, peace activist, singer, songwriter, feminist
content: I think if you give in and accept society's stereotypes, then you start thinking, 'I cannot dance till late at night because I'm 70.'

author: Yoko Ono
authorOccupation: Artist, peace activist, singer, songwriter, feminist
content: I relate to happiness as an ecstatic moment - something you don't create, you encounter.

author: Yoko Ono
authorOccupation: Artist, peace activist, singer, songwriter, feminist
content: When I turned 60, it didn't bother me at all.

author: Yoko Ono
authorOccupation: Artist, peace activist, singer, songwriter, feminist
content: I thought art was a verb, rather than a noun.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Isn't it amazing how much stuff we get done the day before vacation?

author: Zig Ziglar
content: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Take time to be kind and to say 'thank you.'

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Time can be an ally or an enemy. What it becomes depends entirely upon you, your goals, and your determination to use every available minute.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: It is true that integrity alone won't make you a leader, but without integrity you will never be one.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: If you aim at nothing, you'll hit it every time.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: I have always said that everyone is in sales. Maybe you don't hold the title of salesperson, but if the business you are in requires you to deal with people, you, my friend, are in sales.
